titlestmt.titleproper: Inventory of the Hussein Alai writings
titlestmt.author: Finding aid prepared by Hoover Institution Archives Staff.

profiledesc.creation: This finding aid was produced using the Archivists' Toolkit 2013-06-18T11:04-0700
profiledesc.langusage: Finding aid is written in English

did.abstract: Relates to the financial situation in Persia, the Persian oil industry, and the role of Persia in world affairs. Includes writings by A. C. Millspaugh, administrator general of the finances of Persia.

accessrestrict.head: Access
accessrestrict.p: The Hoover Institution Archives only allows access to copies of audiovisual items. To listen to sound recordings or to view videos or films during your visit, please contact the Archives at least two working days before your arrival. We will then advise you of the accessibility of the material you wish to see or hear. Please note that not all audiovisual material is immediately accessible.

userestrict.head: Publication Rights
userestrict.p: For copyright status, please contact the Hoover Institution Archives.

prefercite.head: Preferred Citation
prefercite.p: [Identification of item], Hussein Alai writings, [Box number], Hoover Institution Archives.

acqinfo.head: Acquisition Information
acqinfo.p: Acquired by the Hoover Institution Archives in 1924.

accruals.head: Accruals
accruals.p: Materials may have been added to the collection since this finding aid was prepared. To determine if this has occurred, find the collection in Stanford University's online catalog at http://searchworks.stanford.edu/. Materials have been added to the collection if the number of boxes listed in the library catalog is larger than the number of boxes listed in this finding aid.

bioghist.head: Biographical/Historical Note
bioghist.p: Persian minister to the United States.

scopecontent.head: Scope and Content of Collection
scopecontent.p: Relates to the financial situation in Persia, the Persian oil industry, and the role of Persia in world affairs. Includes writings by A. C. Millspaugh, administrator general of the finances of Persia.

did.unittitle: Hussein, Alai, Address... Lessons for Asia from the American Monroe Doctrine,
Hussein, Alai, The oil fields of Persia.
Millspaugh, A. C., Excerpts from the 4th quarterly report of Dr. A. C. Millspaugh, Administrator General of the Finances for Persia, 1 Mizan 1302 (24 September 1923).
Millspaugh, A. C., Excerpts from the Third quarterly Report of Dr. A. C. Millspaugh, Administrator General of the Finances for Persia, June 1923.
